sentences.sContent: Because I want to inspire, motivate, and “unblock” writers so that they can follow their passion with greater ease.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because I want to inspire, motivate, and “unblock” writers so that they can follow their passion with greater ease.
sentences.sCn: 因为我想激发，鼓励作者们，解除他们的障碍，以便让他们能够更轻松随性的创作。
